name: Duskfall
description:
Will you make it through Dusk, Night, and Dawn? Tap to rotate your character and avoid obstacles as you take a peaceful, challenging, and addictive adventure through three unique levels: Dusk, Night, and Dawn.

◆ Amazing minimalistic graphics
◆ Beautiful custom soundtrack for each level
◆ Over 100 challenging obstacles
◆ New levels and obstacles will be added
◆ Endless gameplay with simple one-touch controls
◆ Unlock new characters to play with
◆ Top your friends with Game Center leaderboards and achievements

How far will you go?
